root.Summary: 1: Postec A, Quéméneur M, Bes M, Mei N, Benaïssa F, Payri C, Pelletier B, Monnin C, Guentas-Dombrowsky L, Ollivier B, Gérard E, Pisapia C, Gérard M, Ménez B,Erauso G. Microbial diversity in a submarine carbonate edifice from theserpentinizing hydrothermal system of the Prony Bay (New Caledonia) over a 6-yearperiod. Front Microbiol. 2015 Aug 27;6:857. doi: 10.3389/fmicb.2015.00857.eCollection 2015. PubMed PMID: 26379636; PubMed Central PMCID: PMC4551099.
